title: Sanguine
description: Sometimes You Can’t Fight Fate…After the Goblin Lord’s identity was revealed, Lisa didn’t think her life could get any worse.She was wrong.Not only does she have to deal with goblins, but now a civil war threatens to tear the vampire race apart, endangering humanity, and the efforts of The Alliance.To add insult to injury, there’s a traitor in their midst.Will Lisa ever catch a break or is she doomed to live her life as a prisoner of her own bloodline?
author: Monique Snyman
